entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT , Smithers
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:47 AM PDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, 3.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Smithers Airport 1:00 PM PDT Sunday 26 March 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: 3.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.5 kPa rising
Visibility: 40.2 km
Humidity: 43 %
Dewpoint: -8.0°C
Wind: N 1 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of rain showers or wet flurries. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy near noon with 30 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High 7. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or wet flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Sunday 26 March 2023
